response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we can start planning from scratch. The task goal is to put a parsley on cheddar. From the observed relations, we know that both parsley and cheddar are inside the fridge. Therefore, the first step should be to open the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the parsley out of the fridge
(3) Take the cheddar out of the fridge
(4) Put the parsley on the cheddar
response.code:
